about_the_game:
LOSTVAIL™ is a medieval soulslike that offers an immersive world and challenging combat. The land has fallen to a dark force, and a sinister fog corrupts even the purest souls. As the fated undead, your task is to defeat 12 corrupted knights of the realm.

TAKE ON DEADLY ENEMIES

  • Battle with over 50 unique weapons, including swords, greatswords, halberds, hammers, spears, twin blades, bows, and spells. Each weapon type offers it's own distinct animations, providing a dynamic combat experience.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER

  • Enjoy a full character creation system, allowing you to tailor your character to your preferred look and playstyle.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS ACROSS SEAMLESS CO-OP AND PVP MODES

  • Experience a gripping single-player narrative, or dive into seamless co-op and PVP modes. Choose from exciting multiplayer options like Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, and Prop Hunt.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 3060 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: LOSTVAIL™ combines a single player narrative with seamless co-op and PVP modes out of the box, including Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag and Prop Hunt.
